name: City Chase
description:
A fun game where you are a car, racing an AI truck to the finishing portal!

Credits:

3D models: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/simplepoly-town-pack-62400

Vehicle assets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/lowpoly-vehicles-models-package-103632

Collision sound: https://www.zapsplat.com/music/bicycle-impact-crash-hits-metal-fence-or-wall/

Music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/the-lounge/348
